title: FPGA Instance Types
description: FPGA instance types available on AWS on the DNAnexus Platform
markdownEnumDescriptions: `mem3_ssd2_fpga1_x24`: 24 cores, 256 GiB RAM, 940 GB storage, 1 FPGA
`mem3_ssd2_fpga2_x48`: 48 cores, 512 GiB RAM, 1,880 GB storage, 2 FPGAs
`mem3_ssd2_fpga8_x192`: 192 cores, 2,048 GiB RAM, 7,520 GB storage, 8 FPGAs
